alert.note: Alert for Meeker; Stearns; Wright (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 19 at 5:30PM CDT until July 19 at 6:15PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: The National Weather Service in the Twin Cities has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Wright County in central Minnesota... Northeastern Meeker County in central Minnesota... Southeastern Stearns County in central Minnesota... * Until 615 PM CDT. * At 529 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Watkins, or 18 miles southwest of St. Cloud, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters reported 74 mph gust near Richmond. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Annandale around 545 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Maple Lake, Buffalo and Montrose. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
